item.title: Characterising Forward-Line Formations in the Australian Football League
item.description: Work in progress. Project is the final year thesis for the Master of Sport Analytics at La Trobe University.

item.title: DIY Dangerousity in the AFL
item.description: This project is currently under assessment for the current cohort of Master of Sport Analytics students at La Trobe University. Project is available upon request during this time.
